entry.title: i2z1/ggonion
entry.summary:
R package for drawing onion diagrams via ggplot2

ggonion

R package for drawing onion diagrams with ggplot2

WIP (Work in progress)

Usage

library(ggonion)

x <- c("one", "two", "three")
clr <- c("red","yellow", "green")
ggonion(x, color = clr)

Install

devtools::install_github("i2z1/ggonion")
